loc2.description: An alien mind forces its way into your body. Pass a Luck(-2) check to guess a way to drive it out, gaining 2 Clue tokens in the process, or else stay here next turn, serving as its host body.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.description: The odd plant has you in its clutches. Pass a Fight(-1) check to break free. If you fail. lose 1 Stamina and 1 Sanity as it partially digests you.
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: A glimmer of gold catches your eye. Gain $2.
